backup.name: Backup name

restoreDialog.restoreContent: Restoring the data deletes all existing data in the tenant. Are you sure that you want to continue?

authentication.msg: A set of default roles and users are automatically created.
authentication.msg2: Roles, users, and their credentials can be customized after tenant creation.
authentication.tooltip: The advanced option is available after the tenant is created
authentication.permissionWarning: You are not authorized to access authentication information.

resources.noAppVersionError: Application version is not selected. On the Basics tab, select the application version.
resources.sizeError: Size details could not be retrieved from the server.
resources.permissionWarning: You are not authorized to access resource information.

createTenant.tenantCreated: Tenant created, POD started. It may take a few minutes for the containers to be ready.

toolTip.cpulimit: Valid CPU format: number or number m (example: 100, 100m)
toolTip.cpurequest: Valid CPU format: number or number m (example: 100, 100m)
toolTip.maxHeap: Valid maxHeap format: optional -Xmx, followed by a number and optional M/m (Example: -Xmx1900m, 1900m)
toolTip.memorylimit: Valid storage format: Number, Number Mi, or Number Gi (Example: 1024, 1024 Mi, 1024 Gi)
toolTip.memoryrequest: Valid storage format: Number, Number Mi, or Number Gi (Example: 1024, 1024 Mi, 1024 Gi)
toolTip.minHeap: Valid minHeap format: optional -Xms, followed by a number and optional M/m (Example: -Xms900m, 900m)

errors.cpuFieldsError: Correct values are not provided for CPU fields
errors.cpuLimitError: The request value is higher than the specified limit for the CPU field. Please make sure the request value is less than the limit.
errors.cpuLowerBoundError: CPU request and limit values must be greater than zero.
errors.errorDownloadFile: The file download failed. Please try again later.
errors.intervalParseError: The specified interval value in the configuration file is invalid. As a replacement, we use a default interval of 30 seconds.
errors.jvmHeapError: Proper values are not provided for JVM heap fields
errors.jvmLimitError: The minimum heap value is higher than the maximum heap value specified for the JVM field. Make sure the minimum heap value is lower than the maximum heap value.
errors.jvmLowerBoundError: The minimum and maximum values of the JVM heap must be greater than zero.
errors.memoryFieldsError: Correct values are not provided for storage fields
errors.memoryLimitError: The request value is higher than the specified limit for the storage field. Please make sure the request value is less than the limit.
errors.memoryLowerBoundError: Memory request and limit values must be greater than zero.
errors.parseError: An error occurred while parsing the input.
errors.requiredError: Please fill out all required fields.

extensions.name: Extension name

suffixError: Error retrieving suffix data from server.

tenantTable.cancelMsg1: Would you like to cancel the new tenant lawsuit?
tenantTable.cancelMsgHeader: Cancel the creation of a new tenant
tenantTable.deleteMsg1: This action can not be undone.
tenantTable.deleteMsg2: Deleting tenants will result in disconnected users and/or loss of data that is not also stored elsewhere.
tenantTable.name: name of the tenant

updateTenant.applyBtnInfo: For the changes to take effect, the tenant POD must be restarted. Restarting the tenant POD may result in connected users being disconnected and/or unsaved data being lost.
updateTenant.applyChanges: Apply the changes and restart the tenant POD
updateTenant.backBtnInfo: You made changes that were not applied. Unapplied changes will be lost when returning to the tenant list.
